byline.original: By MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT and DURAID ADNAN
byline.contributor: Employees of The New York Times contributed reporting from Anbar, Kirkuk and Diyala.

snippet: Suicide bombers and gunmen disguised as security officers attacked two police headquarters and took hostages in Anbar Province.
lead_paragraph: Suicide bombers and gunmen disguised as security officers attacked two police headquarters and took hostages in Anbar Province.

headline.main: Two More Attacks in Restive Iraqi Province
headline.seo: 2 More Attacks in Iraq’s Restive Anbar Province
headline.print_headline: Iraq: 7 Police Officers Killed in 2 Attacks
